title: Jack in a Box
description: Exciting Short Read! Hunting Jack Reacher is dangerous business. Reacher lives totally off the grid, but he has friends -- and enemies -- in high places   FBI Special Agents Kim Otto and Carlos Gaspar have received a special off-the-books assignment: build a secret file on Jack Reacher. Otto and Gaspar reveal a bit of themselves as they make every effort to put Jack in a Box. Reacher fans know that no one boxes with Jack and lives to tell about it. Will Otto and Gaspar be the first to succeed where so many have failed?  New York Times and USA Today Bestselling Author Diane Capri brings her insider knowledge to bear on her friend Lee Child's iconic character. Have you joined the Hunt for Jack Reacher yet?
author: Diane Capri
